### Tender Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police requires the procurement of two (2) Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS), with the option of purchasing an additional five (5) systems within two (2) years of contract award. The procurement also includes options to purchase additional controllers, multi-battery charging stations, batteries, and propellers, as well as extended warranties for the RPA systems. 

The RPAS are intended to assist RCMP officers in performing various operational tasks related to border security.

### Submission Information

If you require any further clarification or additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us. You may reach Samantha Giuliano, Acquisition Specialist, at (`samantha.giuliano@rcmp-grc.gc.ca`, 519-640-5124).
